thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Charles

author: Charles
title: Charles
text:
After recieving the notice from the irs for failure to file for several years and getting over the shock of the bill sent, I contacted Optima Tax Relief.
The initial shock of forcing me to address the situation, it was quite a relief to deal with Denny and Mr. Santiago and hand over all the responsibility to them.
It was a little disconcerting as I had never had problems with the IRS and certainly had no idea what to expect as I am a Mechanic by trade and certainly not a CPA.
I found it very comfortable to talk with the representatives at Optima, and found myself trusting them thoroughly. Thank Goodness as the IRS decided they would fix me and garnesh my wages by 80 percent a week before Christmas (very considerate fo them to go against the order to not garnish). I contacted Optima and they responded very quickly to ensure that practice would stop, then and there. Too bad they didn't give it back 'right away'.
Thier Team dove into my return problems and fixed them right away and to my surprise THE IRS OWED ME a considerable amount of money from the withholdings and write offs that I was entitled to.
I can tell you behind the scenes Mr Santiago earned his keep witht the company as he battled the IRS and insisted on money being returned that the IRS stated 'Past the the time limit for return'
I was very pleased with the representation by Optima and would highly recommend the pease of mind by hiring them to deal with the profeesional confiscaters at the IRS
